lexUnit.name: forehead.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the part of the face above the eyebrows.

sentence.text: He pressed his forehead against the glass .
Caroline shook her head , then rested her forehead against his chin .
Mrs Feather looked quite pale , and there was a constant and discreet pressing of handkerchiefs to the upper lips and foreheads of all the women .
Appearance money is officially frowned upon by the European Tour but the creases in the foreheads of the officers have not been discerned by the Spaniard .
Boltwood rubbed a little on the forehead of a four year-old who immune system was severely depressed .
I crushed some of the flowers and rubbed them on my forehead as I 'm told it has an invigorating effect on cabbages and thought it might do the same for me .
` Do be careful , love , " said his wife , a frown on her forehead and a worried tone to her voice .
There was a V-shaped vein sticking out in Algy 's forehead .
The spectre carried a great staff and , with his high forehead and blond hair , bore an uncanny resemblance to a painting of St John .
Aunt Margaret swiftly bent down and kissed Victoria 's already slumbering forehead .
Gazzer belted his forehead with the flat of his hand to clear out the nightmares .
` Blimmin' heat , " he grumbled , wiping his forehead with a handkerchief .
Today you have watched our mandarins banging their foreheads on the flagstones -- but not for our emperor !
I should have sat up , eyes staring and sweat pouring off my forehead like in some old Hammer Brothers movie .
But one runnel of sweat began to trickle down his forehead from under his headdress .
Quite different from drake Eider , having differently shaped head , markedly peaked orange forehead , red bill , pale grey head and black back .
He had a broad forehead , rather sallow face , and thinning hair .
Adult males have a humped forehead and longer fin extensions , but there is no obvious way of sexing smaller individuals .
She had the nicest forehead I ever saw . "
